name: air separation facility construction | air separation facility | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6702/documentation

Large uncertainties for equipment used due to weak data from small air separation plants. Process refers to an estimated air separation plant with 80'000 t liquid products per year. Assumed life time 20 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Aluminium for distillation column, approximated infrastructure process for further infrastructure and dismatling, land use, no energy for construction processes included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data partly from U.S. plant producer.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolation small plants with a production volume of 0.1-3 t per hour to a larger plant with 10 t per hour production. This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Estimation from weak data of smaller plants.
